summary: BCPB adds playable child races for Humans, Elves and Beast races and can optionally replace default children with BCPB children
descriptionHtml:
Better Children Plus Beasts v0.2b


DESCRIPTION
____________
	BCPB adds playable child races for Humans, Elves and Beast races. 
	Changes default children to BCPB children.
	So far only changes female head/body. Once I find better male meshes 
	will do them as well. As of now Males just look like smaller Adults so far.
	
	Screen Shots displaying 
	ApachiSkyHair (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10168)
	Nidias Face (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7485)
	RANs HeadMesh Variants Type A (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7127)
	Skin by navetsea (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6554)


REQUIRES
____________
	-Skyrim.esm
	-Update.esm
	-Optional body requires CBBE/UNP body textures of your choice.
	-Higher Magic DB CookQuest Fix (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10770)

	-HIGHLY RECCOMEND Nadias Face! (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7485)

FEATURES
____________
V0.2b:
	-Changed head size a bit as reccomended.
	-Changes all default female children to BCPB children and adds 
	 15 more presets as well. Makes Child Outfits wearable for all.

V0.1b:
	-Adds playable child races for Argonian, Breton, Dark Elf, High Elf, 
	 Imperia, Khajiit, Nord, Ork, Redguard and Wood Elf.
	-New Head Mesh (RANs HeadMesh Variants by RAN46)
	-Optional Body Mesh (Variant of CBBE or UNP)
	-All Armor, hair etc playable for my child races.
	-Only 2 female preset NPC\'s for each race so far.

INSTALLATION
____________
	-Place \\MainFiles\\meshes folder in to your \"Skyrim install path\"\\data\\ directory.

	-Optional files. 
	-Optional body mesh: place its Meshes\\ folder into 
	 your \"Skyrim install path\"\\Data folder 
	 (WARNING) WILL OVERWRITE YOUR DEFAULT femalebody_0.nif AND femalebody_1.nif so
	 back them up if you want to keep your current body for later.
	

	Installing Main Files only will install everything but the modified CBBE body.
	The Childs will have your current default adult body.
	Installing the Optional body mesh will replace your default body with one that has
	a much smaller femalebody_0.nif and a well proportioned femalebody_1.nif resulting in 
	the ability to go from flat/skinny for child races to ample for adults. 
	See screen shots for examples.

COMPATABILITY AND TIPS
_____________
	-OPTIONAL BODY FILES WILL REPLACE DEFAUL BODY MESHES!
	-May conflict with any other mod that changes the default childrens races.
	-Should not interfere with any other mod that I know of, will know more after testing.
	 Feedback welcome!


CREDITS
_____________

-RANs HeadMesh Variants by RAN46 (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7127)
-Caliente Female Body Mod BBE and BodySlide (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666)
-dimon99 for his Dimonized UNP Female Body. (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6709)
author: daxloves
